text: Kang Young-Hoon (May 30, 1922 - May 10, 2016) was a South Korean politician. He was the Prime Minister of South Korea from 5 December 1988 until 27 December 1990, and acting Prime Minister until 16 December 1988.Steering Committee: Young-Hoon Kang , USC Asia Conference 2004, Accessed March 31, 2008. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of South Korea
title: Kang Young-hoon
